comment: Good professor, fairly heavy courseload. can turn in all work aside from quizzes for partial credit until the last day of class, make sure you stay on it or youll end up with a C like me for turning in too much late work. if you do the work on time it would be a very easy A. I did the entire course of work in one night.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Took her class for application 1 where i learned python, and she was helpful and quick in responses in related to the course and anything needed. I took the course online, and the only thing that was needed for points is to either attend on teams or in-person, it's completely up to you to decide.
She genuinely wants the best for her students and is easily accessible, she will also happily help you with anything all you have to do is ask.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr Sample was very helpful in directing me when any problem arose. She was always accessible whenever I needed her.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: She is fair and patient, there are a lot of assignments and it is a fast-paced course, but it is doable and she helps you if you ask for help.

Mrs. Sample was a fantastic professor for IS3020. She was very helpful and responsive and her credentials are beyond what's needed for this course. I highly recommend taking her classes, as she will help you to learn the material while also being very forgiving with grading. She is kind, thoughtful, and everything you want from a professor.

The instructions for her assignments are unclear but if you reach out to her she will either try to help or tell you to google it? Theres a lot of reading quizzes and tough assignments so you need to put in work for this class but it is not impossible to get an A

This class had a lot of reading bit overall it was pretty easy. However, if you ever have a question, expect to wait foreverrrrrr for her to respond. Even when one gets a response their question is not always correctly answered.

Super nice Professor, the only thing is the class seems to be a lot of busy work. There is a group project at the end of the class, which is a majority of your grade. Do well on everything else because if your group fails, you fail
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Group projects
